name: Chaosmith
description:
Chaosmith is an exciting crafting game where you're the blacksmith of an underground production line. As old tools are flung at you, you must disassemble and reassemble as fast as you can to keep business in motion. Will you be able to keep up? Or will you become the bottleneck?

DISCLAIMER: There's achievements to unlock skins, but skins only work in the executable, not in the WebGL version!
